(static) Event_Notify

Notify event type for ECG

(static) getAllConnectedDevices()

Get all connected ECG device e.g. {"devices":["A4D5783FB00C","A4D5783FFE58"]}
Source:
  • ECGModule.js, line 134

(static) getBattery(serialNumber)

getBattery
  • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
  • If get successfully, following event will be emit:
    ECGModule.Event_Notify("event_notify_ecg")
    The key and value will be as below:
    KeyValue
    actionECGProfileModule.ACTION_BATTERY_ECG("ACTION_BATTERY_ECG")
    ECGProfileModule.BATTERY_ECG("BATTERY_ECG")
  • Attention, if you want to be notified, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
    DeviceEventEmitter.addListener(ECGProfileModule.Event_Notify, function (e: Event){});
Parameters:
Name Type Description
serialNumber string the mac address of scale
Source:
  • ECGModule.js, line 103

(static) startMeasure()

startMeasure
  • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
  • If get successfully, following event will be emit:
    ECGModule.Event_Notify("event_notify_ecg")
    The key and value will be as below:
    KeyValue
    actionHS6ProfileModule.ACTION_MEASURE_ECG("ACTION_MEASURE_ECG")
    ECGProfileModule.ACTION_MEASURE_ECG("ACTION_MEASURE_ECG") HS6ProfileModule.ACTION_MEASURE_WAVEData("ACTION_MEASURE_WAVEData")
    ECGProfileModule.ACTION_MEASURE_ECGPulse("ACTION_MEASURE_ECGPulse")
  • If error happens, following event will be emit:
    ECGProfileModule.Event_Notify("event_notify_ecg")
    The key and value will be as below:
    KeyValue
    actionECGProfileModule.ACTION_ERROR_ECG("ACTION_ERROR_ECG")
    ECGProfileModule.ERROR_NUM_ECG("ERROR_NUM_ECG")The error code: 1 user information upload error; 2 bind error.
  • Attention, if you want to be notified, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
    DeviceEventEmitter.addListener(ECGProfileModule.Event_Notify, function (e: Event){});
Source:
  • ECGModule.js, line 79

(static) stopMeasure()

stopMeasure
  • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
  • If get successfully, following event will be emit:
    ECGModule.Event_Notify("event_notify_ecg")
    The key and value will be as below:
    KeyValue
    actionECGProfileModule.ACTION_STOPMEASURE_ECG("ACTION_STOPMEASURE_ECG")
  • Attention, if you want to be notified, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
    DeviceEventEmitter.addListener(ECGProfileModule.Event_Notify, function (e: Event){});

SyncTime.
  • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
  • If get successfully, following event will be emit:
    ECGModule.Event_Notify("event_notify_ecg")
    The key and value will be as below:
    KeyValue
    actionECGProfileModule.ACTION_SYSTIME("ACTION_SYSTIME")
    ECGProfileModule.ACTION_SYSTIME("ACTION_SYSTIME")
  • Attention, if you want to be notified, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
    DeviceEventEmitter.addListener(ECGProfileModule.Event_Notify, function (e: Event){});
